mapper.select: select user_id userId,user_name userName, user_photo userPhoto, user_sex userSex,user_fans userFans,user_fans_f userFansf, guest guest, user_state userState,DATE_FORMAT(first_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') firstTime from fly_user where user_id = (select max(user_id) from fly_user)
mapper.insert: insert into fly_user (user_name, user_photo, user_sex, user_fans, user_fans_f, guest, user_state, first_time) values (#{userName},#{userPhoto},#{userSex},0,0,0,0,now());
mapper.update: update fly_user set user_fans_f = #{userFansf},user_state =#{userState} where user_id = #{userId};
update fly_user set user_state =#{userState} where user_id = #{userId};
mapper.select: select sum(user_fans+user_fans_f) from fly_user where user_id =#{userId};
select id Id,close_id closeId, close_name closeName from fly_userstate;
